pli-tv-pvr1.8:5.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:5.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:5.3: Akkhāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.8:5.4: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.8:5.5: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:5.6: methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:6.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti, sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā, channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti, catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ, sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:6.2: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:6.5: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:6.7: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:6.10: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …
pli-tv-pvr1.8:7.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:7.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:7.4: anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karonto imaṃ ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:8.1: Sā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajati, sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā, channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ, sattannaṃ, samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:8.2: Sā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajati—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:8.7: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:8.10: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
